member.name: T:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo
member.summary: This class can be used by the or any of its descendants to retrieve valuable information about the service that is to be used. This class is added for improved usability of the DataSourceInfo in combination with the ServiceRepository.

member.name: F:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.EndpointConfigurationNameKey
member.summary: Defines the key that is used to store and retrieve the endpointconfigurationname.

member.name: F:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.RemoteAddressKey
member.summary: Defines the key that is used to store and retrieve the endpointaddress of the service.

member.name: F:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.BindingKey
member.summary: Defines the key that is used to store and retrieve the binding that is used to communicate with the service.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using default values.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified endpointconfigurationname.
member.param: The name of the endpointconfiguration in the application's configfile.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified endpointconfigurationname and service address.
member.param: The name of the endpointconfiguration in the application's configfile.
The address of the remote service.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified endpointconfigurationname and service address.
member.param: The name of the endpointconfiguration in the application's configfile.
The address of the remote service.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.#ctor(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding,System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified binding and service address.
member.param: The binding that must be used to communicate with the service.
The address of the remote service.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified default values. If the default values do not specify any of the supported properties, the default values will be used.
member.param: The default values that are to be used.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.IsEndpointConfigurationNameSpecified(Enkoni.Framework.Entities.DataSourceInfo)
member.summary: Determines if the endpointconfigurationname is specified in the source information.
member.param: The datasource information that is queried.
member.returns: if the value is defined; otherwise.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.SelectEndpointConfigurationName(Enkoni.Framework.Entities.DataSourceInfo)
member.summary: Selects the endpointconfigurationname from the specified datasource information.
member.param: The datasource information that is queried.
member.returns: The value that is stored in the datasource information or if the value could not be found.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.IsRemoteAddressSpecified(Enkoni.Framework.Entities.DataSourceInfo)
member.summary: Determines if the remote address is specified in the source information.
member.param: The datasource information that is queried.
member.returns: if the value is defined; otherwise.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.SelectRemoteAddress(Enkoni.Framework.Entities.DataSourceInfo)
member.summary: Selects the remote address from the specified datasource information.
member.param: The datasource information that is queried.
member.returns: The value that is stored in the datasource information or if the value could not be found.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.IsBindingSpecified(Enkoni.Framework.Entities.DataSourceInfo)
member.summary: Determines if the binding is specified in the source information.
member.param: The datasource information that is queried.
member.returns: if the value is defined; otherwise.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.SelectBinding(Enkoni.Framework.Entities.DataSourceInfo)
member.summary: Selects the binding from the specified datasource information.
member.param: The datasource information that is queried.
member.returns: The value that is stored in the datasource information or if the value could not be found.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.IsEndpointConfigurationNameSpecified
member.summary: Determines if the endpointconfigurationname is specified in the source information.
member.returns: if the value is defined; otherwise.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.IsRemoteAddressSpecified
member.summary: Determines if the remote address is specified in the source information.
member.returns: if the value is defined; otherwise.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.IsBindingSpecified
member.summary: Determines if the binding is specified in the source information.
member.returns: if the value is defined; otherwise.

member.name: P:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.EndpointConfigurationName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the endpointconfiguration in the applicationconfig file.

member.name: P:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.RemoteAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the endpointaddress of the service.

member.name: P:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceSourceInfo.Binding
member.summary: Gets or sets the binding that must be used to connect to the service.

member.name: T:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceRepository`1
member.summary: This abstract class extends the abstract class and implements some of the functionality using WCF datacommunication. This implementation can be used a base for any WCF-service repositories.
member.typeparam: The type of the entity that is handled by this repository.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceRepository`1.#ctor(Enkoni.Framework.Entities.DataSourceInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified .
member.param: The datasource information that must be used to access the sourcefile.

member.name: M:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceRepository`1.CreateEntityCore(Enkoni.Framework.Entities.DataSourceInfo)
member.summary: Creates a new entity of type . This is done by calling the default constructor of .
member.param: Information about the datasource that may not have been set at an earlier stage.

member.name: P:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceRepository`1.EndpointConfigurationName
member.summary: Gets the endpointconfigurationname that references the used endpointconfiguration.

member.name: P:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceRepository`1.RemoteAddress
member.summary: Gets the address of the remote service.

member.name: P:Enkoni.Framework.Entities.ServiceRepository`1.Binding
member.summary: Gets the binding that is used to communicate with the remote service.
